welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lombok, a beautiful island known for its stunning beaches, lush landscapes, and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: RM. Khas Ayam Rarang
restaurants.description: RM. Khas Ayam Rarang is a diner located in Kabupaten Lombok Timur.
restaurants.address: Jl Raya Rarang ( dpan Masjid Rarang ) (Rarang Terara), Kabupaten Lombok Timur, Nusa Tenggara Barat

restaurants.description: Bakso dan Mie Ayam Mas Cipto, Kopang is a asian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Cafe Bale Bale
restaurants.description: Cafe Bale Bale is a indonesian restaurant located in Tete Batu.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within Indonesia.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from Indonesia.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
